about_the_game:
Important hint: this DLC will NOT unlock another room!

While the main game of Escape Room - The Sick Colleague is free to play, if you like it you can still support it by buying this supporting DLC. It contains a magnificent sticker that will show up on the main menu and the multiplayer lobby so all your friends will know what a nice person you are ;) You can also download a high-resolution version of the sticker in the png format from the main menu.

With your support, some of the costs for buying some of the 3D models or paying the translators and voice actors fairly can be covered. It will also help to keep the monthly fees for the multiplayer servers in check.

Thank you very much in advance! :)
